memories.content: Customer provided comprehensive website content revisions in PDF format. Key changes include: expanded About page with refined credentials list, detailed Methodology page with 3-step Insight Mapping System, updated Services page with 3 offerings (1:1 coaching, Insight Mapping System, Becoming You Method), design updates (remove emojis, add vertical SIL logo, add photo), and structural improvements throughout all pages.
memories.context: Self Inventory Lab website content review - major update with detailed content for all pages

memories.content: Successfully completed comprehensive website improvements for Self Inventory Lab based on detailed customer feedback. Key updates: 1) Enhanced About page with refined credentials and personal story, 2) Completely updated Methodology page with detailed 3-step Insight Mapping System, 3) Restructured Services page from 4 to 3 offerings with FAQs, 4) Removed all emojis for professional appearance, 5) Added SIL logo placeholders, 6) Added professional photo placeholder, 7) Maintained terra-cotta color scheme, 8) Updated SEO elements. All major content areas now align with customer's vision for more professional, credible presentation.
memories.context: Self Inventory Lab website renovation project completion

memories.content: Services page analysis: Current page has good overall structure but lacks visual hierarchy and readability improvements needed. Key sections include hero, services overview, how it works, how to choose, testimonials, FAQ, and contact. CSS has comprehensive styling but missing some specific improvements for text spacing and layout.
memories.context: Self-Inventory Lab website services page formatting review

memories.content: Successfully completed Services page formatting improvements: Enhanced visual hierarchy with section headers, redesigned service cards with better structure and CTAs, improved FAQ section with clear Q&A separation, enhanced typography and line heights, optimized decision guide section with numbered cards and icons, and ensured mobile responsiveness. All changes maintain brand consistency with existing design system.
memories.context: Self-Inventory Lab website services page formatting completion

memories.content: Successfully integrated the Self-Inventory Lab logo across the website. Downloaded logo from Midjourney URL, replaced all placeholder divs in navigation across all pages (index, about, methodology, services), added responsive CSS styling for proper display on desktop (40px) and mobile (32px), and pushed all changes to GitHub. Logo now displays consistently across the entire website with proper scaling and alignment.
memories.context: Self-Inventory Lab website logo integration completion

memories.content: Self-Inventory Lab website social media integration research findings: Current website has no existing social media links. Website structure includes 4 main pages (index, about, methodology, services) with consistent navigation and footer. Design system uses terra-cotta color scheme (#C4806B), Playfair Display for headers, Inter for body text, and Dancing Script for accents. Footer currently contains only copyright and basic info. Based on 2025 UX best practices, footer placement is preferred (72% of top marketing websites use footer placement), with LinkedIn being optimal for professional coaches and Instagram for personal branding/inspiration content.
memories.context: Social media integration research for Self-Inventory Lab website
